::: {#def-density}

For $A\subseteq G$ and Følner sequence $\Phi=(\Phi_N)_{n=1}^\infty$, we write
\begin{align*}
    \overline{d}_\Phi(A)&=\limsup_{N\rightarrow\infty}\frac{|A\cap\Phi_N|}{|\Phi_N|}
    \\\underline{d}_\Phi(A)&=\liminf_{N\rightarrow\infty}\frac{|A\cap\Phi_N|}{|\Phi_N|}
\end{align*}
to be the *upper and lower densities of $A$ with respect to $\Phi$*, respectively. If these agree, then we can write
$$
d_\Phi(A)=\lim_{N\rightarrow\infty}\frac{|A\cap\Phi_N|}{|\Phi_N|}
$$
to be the *density of $A$ with respect to $\Phi$*. We also define the *upper Banach density of $A$* by
$$
\overline{d}(A)=\sup\{d_\Phi(A):\text{for Følner sequences }\Phi\text{ where }d_\Phi(A)\text{ exists}\}.
$$
:::
